Scene:
The Poisoned Sake
(Sumiyoshi Matsubara dokushu / 住吉松原毒酒)

Play: The Crossroads of Gappo (摂州合邦辻)

Production: September 1973

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Rodayū V (豊竹呂大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))
